primary_trope.name: extreme_race_quality
primary_trope.hook_text: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Race Quality. Nova Eroica is one.
primary_trope.mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Nova Eroica? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Nova Eroica scored 74 out of 100. Elite tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Nova Eroica. Buonconvento, Tuscany, Italy. 84 mi. 135 km, 2.8 thousand m. 70% gravel, 30% paved. Tuscan rolling hills. Technical rating: 3/5.
beats.text_on_screen: Nova Eroica | Buonconvento, Tuscany, Italy | 84 mi
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: The numbers. All fourteen of them. Race Quality. 5 out of 5. Everything about this race is dialed. Perfect execution of the Eroica formula—84 miles through Tuscan countryside without the tourist trap bullshit. Experience. 5 out of 5. Once-in-a-lifetime course experience. The combination of 'gourmet food, wine, and the culture of Italy, provides a cycling experience that is like no other. Value. 5 out of 5. Dollar for dollar, one of the best in gravel. Access to iconic Strade Bianche sectors combined with Italian aid stations featuring wine and gourmet food creates exceptional value. Length. 4 out of 5. Double-digit hours are on the table. Elevation. 4 out of 5. Your power-to-weight ratio matters here. 9,186 feet over 84 miles through the same sectors that challenge WorldTour pros during Strade Bianche. Adventure. 4 out of 5. The kind of ride you'll tell stories about. Racing the same sectors as Fabian Cancellara through 'abundant vineyards and steep sterrate' delivers adventure wrapped in cycling history. Prestige. 4 out of 5. Finishing this one means something. Using the actual Strade Bianche sectors gives this race cycling pedigree that matters. Community. 4 out of 5. Strong community. This race builds friendships. 'There is a big party at the finish line, with tasty food and a festive environment' where riders share experiences.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The remaining six. Quick-fire. Field Depth. 4 out of 5. Stacked field. Fast riders everywhere. Logistics. 3 out of 5. Competent operation. Shows up on time. Technicality. 3 out of 5. Requires line choice. Rewards the attentive rider. Climate. 3 out of 5. The weather could go either way. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Mid-range expenses. Budget a proper race weekend. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Low altitude. Breathe easy.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: The logistics. What you actually need to know.
beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Tuscan Strade Bianche Paradise. You need legitimate climbing legs for 9.2 thousand feet of Tuscan punishment and the bike handling skills to descend white gravel roads that turn sketchy fast. This isn't a beginner's intro to European gravel. it's proper suffering in postcard scenery. Show up undertrained and those rolling hills will expose every fitness gap you've been ignoring.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Nova Eroica isn't quite right for you. L'Eroica gives you the same Tuscan strade bianche with vintage bike requirements and more prestige. While Strade Bianche Eroica delivers similar terrain with better organization and clearer logistics. Both spare you the mystery of what exactly you're signing up for.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
